author: Abergale Shep
description:
Traumaland, Josh Silver’s third book, is a psychological thriller that follows seventeen-year-old Eli, who is coming to terms with his near-fatal car accident. Everything he knows about what happened comes to him in fragments and has left him emotionally destitute, seemingly without any recollection in the months following the accident. Desperate to feel something (anything) […]

The post REVIEW: Traumaland by Josh Silver appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Traumaland by Josh Silver
